item.description:
üõí Open Source Shopping Agent ü§ñ

Check out this new shopping-assistant template from @ioniccommerce.

Using our OpenAI tools agent as a base, this straightforward agent scours the web for deals related to your query!

item.title: RT Jacob Lee: üñºÔ∏è Vision-based eval example üñºÔ∏è Custom evaluators in @LangChainAI‚Äôs LangSmith are powerful! This notebook visually evaluates a ...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇJacob Lee
üñºÔ∏è Vision-based eval example üñºÔ∏è

Custom evaluators in @LangChainAI‚Äôs LangSmith are powerful!

This notebook visually evaluates a chain that generates webpages. It renders output HTML with Puppeteer, then passes the image to @OpenAI GPT-4V for scoring:

https://github.com/langchain-ai/langsmith-cookbook/blob/main/typescript-testing-examples/vision-evals/vision-evals.ipynb

item.title: RT Jacob Lee: üî± OpenAI V3 Embeddings üî± @openai released new v3 embeddings models earlier this week! - text-embedding-3-small model is smaller an...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇJacob Lee
üî± OpenAI V3 Embeddings üî±

@openai released new v3 embeddings models earlier this week!

- text-embedding-3-small model is smaller and more efficient
- text-embedding-3-large model is larger and more powerful

Interestingly, you can tune the number of dimensions output vectors‚Ä¶

item.title: üîßUpdated tool calling docs More and more model APIs are starting to expose `function` and `tool` calling parameters We've improved the DevEx around...
item.description:
üîßUpdated tool calling docs

More and more model APIs are starting to expose `function` and `tool` calling parameters

We've improved the DevEx around this, and updated key docs

Function calling guide: https://python.langchain.com/docs/modules/model_io/chat/function_calling

Tool calling output parser: https://python.langchain.com/docs/modules/model_io/output_parsers/types/openai_tools

item.description:
RT‚ÄÇSudarshan Koirala
Open Source in Action üöÄ

- Mistral model from @MistralAI is used as Large Language model via @ollama
- @LangChainAI is used as a Framework for LLM
-@chainlit_io is used for deploying

YT: https://youtu.be/evOQpxq3cos

#langchain #ollama #chainlit #mistral #llm #chatui #opensource

item.description:
ü§ñ Agent Toolkits: Robocorp ü§ñ

Tool use is a central component of agentic workflows, but converting arbitrary function into tools can be a challenge.

Enter @RobocorpInc's action server! It's a great way to convert any python function into a tool.

These tools can then be‚Ä¶

item.title: ü¶úüõ†Ô∏è LangSmith Evals in JavaScript ü¶úüõ†Ô∏è LangSmith now supports a native `runOverDataset` method for evaluating your JavaScript LLM applica...
item.description:
ü¶úüõ†Ô∏è LangSmith Evals in JavaScript ü¶úüõ†Ô∏è

LangSmith now supports a native `runOverDataset` method for evaluating your JavaScript LLM applications!

You can configure custom or off-the-shelf evaluators to compare + score the the outputs of your app against ideal reference outputs.‚Ä¶
